https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7ncbc91rZuTFerbXn8pP6nOBvNH.jpg Casper dreads to start at a new daycare, but when he arrives he meets Emma who has a stuffed animal that can come to life. From that day Casper and Emma are best friends. Casper and Emma: Best Friends
